result.title: help with this interesting gym problem
result.content: Hi guys, I need your help in this problem. it is problem 'K' (subpalindroms) in this contest http://www.codeforces.com/gym/100032/attachments. in the problem a string S with length < 10^5 is given and want us to answer m <3*10^5 queries, each query want us to count the number of palindromic substrings in a given interval. I couldn't find any solution better than O(n^2) although I tried to use hashing and palindromic tree any hint please .. thanks in advance.
